title: I Built A Laptop?!
description: Who needs a MacBook when we can build our own laptop? Apple Kills the Lightning Port:  Wish.com for ALPHAS Only:  YouTube, Fix This:  The WORST Xbox:  The WEIRDEST Consoles of All Time:   Subscribe!  Twitter:  Matt:  Instagram:   Chapter Titles ------------------------------- 0:00 Hello and Welcome 0:28 The New Framework? 1:30 The CrowPi2 2:38 It DOESNT have a battery?! 3:31 Whats Inside? 4:31 Installing the PI 5:30 First Thoughts 6:26 Is it Fast? 7:32 This is a cool idea BUT. 8:10 Can it Game? 9:01 Price and Final Thoughts
